import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import './UserProfileModal.css' function UserProfileModal({userItems, setUserItems, handleCloseModal, showEditForm}) { const {bio, full_name, location, items, image} = userItems const [formState, setFormState]=useState({ full_name: `${userItems.full_name}`, location: `${userItems.location}`, bio: `${userItems.bio}`, image: `${userItems.image}` }) //This function is setting state and adding in the user input values const handleProfileChange = (e) => { setFormState({...formState, [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const editUserProfile = (e) => { e.preventDefault() fetch(`http://localhost:9292/edituserprofile/${userItems.id}`, { method: "PATCH", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ full_name: formState.full_name, location: formState.location, bio: formState.bio, image: formState.image, }) }) handleCloseModal() .then(response => response.json()) .then(newUserInfo => setUserItems(newUserInfo)) } return ( <>




) } export default UserProfileModal
